General.Name: C3 Metals Inc
General.Description: C3 Metals Inc. engages in the identification, acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of copper and gold deposits in Peru, Jamaica, and Canada. Its flagship property is the 100% owned Jasperoide copper-gold project that consists of 49 claims covering an area of 263 km2 located in Southern Peru, as well as has an option agreement to earn a 100% interest in two concessions covering an area of 5 sq km. The company was formerly known as Carube Copper Corp. and changed its name to C3 Metals Inc. in July 2020. C3 Metals Inc. is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 161 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2S1
